file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-61-01-04 - EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT). B. The transmitter is installed in center fuselage 4, on the right side. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER ALL 25-61-01-000-801-A (ELT 110-4) - REMOVAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER ALL 25-61-01-400-801-A (ELT 110-4) - INSTALLATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER ALL 25-61-01-000-802-A (ELT SATORI) - REMOVAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER ALL 25-61-01-400-802-A (ELT SATORI) - INSTALLATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER ALL 25-61-01-000-803-A (ELT C406-2) - REMOVAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER ALL 25-61-01-400-803-A (ELT C406-2) - INSTALLATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER - ALL 25-61-01-040-801-A DEACTIVATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER - ALL 25-61-01-440-801-A REACTIVATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-61-01 Page 1 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT 110-4) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) ARTEX 110-4. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Center fuselage IV, Passenger cabin - 262 RH C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage 4 H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the Circuit Breakers Panel, open the ELT circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open the toilet maintenance panel. (3) Get access to the ELT unit. I. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the 2 screws on the front of the mounting rack. (2) Pull the mounting rack cap out of the transmitter unit. (3) Disconnect the coaxial cable and the molex connector cable from the ELT unit. (4) Remove the ELT unit from the mounting rack. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-61-01 Page 2 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Emergency Locator Transmitter (ARTEX 110-4) - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONE 262 B A DET. A ELT C DET. C DET. B 145AMM250024.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-61-01 Page 3 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT 110-4) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) ARTEX 110-4. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER SYSTEM AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-801-A/500 (ELT 110-4) - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Center fuselage IV, Passenger cabin - 262 RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage 4 I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the ELT unit on its baseplate with the arrow in the flight direction. (2) Connect the coaxial cable and the molex connector cable to the ELT unit. (3) Install the mounting rack cap to the transmitter unit. (4) Attach the 2 screws on the front of the mounting rack. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-61-01 Page 4 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the toilet maintenance panel. (2) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, close the ELT circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it. (3) Do the Emergency Locator Transmitter System (ELT 110-4) - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-61-01 Page 5 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-01-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT SATORI) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT SATORI). B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Center fuselage IV, Passenger cabin - 262 RH C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage IV H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the ELT circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open the toilet maintenance panel. (3) Get access to the ELT unit. I. Removal SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) On the ELT unit (1), set the switch (3) to the OFF position. (2) Carefully disconnect the aircraft ELT antenna connector (4). (3) Disconnect the electrical connector (5). (4) Release the belt (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 25-61-01 Page 6 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Remove the ELT unit (1) from the mounting rack. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 25-61-01 Page 7 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ELT SATORI Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT SATORI) - Removal/Installation Figure 402 ZONE 262 B A 5. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 1. ELT UNIT DET. A C 4. ELT ANTENNA CONNECTOR 3. SWITCH DET. C 2. BELT (2) DET. B 145AMM250032.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 25-61-01 Page 8 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-01-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT SATORI) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT SATORI). (2) Before the installation of the ELT it is necessary to program it. The function of the programming is to save in the ELT memory the country code and the aircraft registration number. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER SYSTEM AMM TASK 25-61-00-400-801-A/200 (ELT SATORI) - PROGRAMMING EMERGENCY-LOCATOR-TRANSMITTER SYSTEM AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-802-A/500 (ELT SATORI) - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Center fuselage IV, Passenger cabin - 262 RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage IV I. Installation SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Do the programming of the ELT SATORI system (AMM TASK 25-61-00-400-801-A/ 200). (2) Install the ELT unit (1) on the mounting rack, with the antenna for portable use included. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 25-61-01 Page 9 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Attach the belt (2). (4) Connect the electrical connector (5). (5) Carefully connect the aircraft ELT antenna connector (4). (6) On the ELT unit (1), set the switch (3) to the AUTO position. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Close the toilet maintenance panel. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the ELT circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it. (3) Do the Emergency Locator Transmitter System (ELT SATORI) - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-802-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 25-61-01 Page 10 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-01-000-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 6. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT C406-2) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) ARTEX C406-2. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Center fuselage IV, Passenger cabin - 262 RH C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage 4 H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) On the Circuit Breakers Panel, open the ELT circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open the toilet maintenance panel. (3) Get access to the ELT unit. I. Removal SUBTASK 020-004-A (1) Release the 2 screws on the front of the mounting rack. (2) Pull the mounting rack cap out of the transmitter unit. (3) Disconnect the coaxial cables and the molex connector cable from the ELT unit. (4) Remove the ELT unit from the mounting rack. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 25-61-01 Page 11 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Emergency Locator Transmitter (ARTEX C406-2) - Removal/Installation Figure 403 B ZONE 262 A ELT DET. A C DET. C DET. B 145AMM251084.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 25-61-01 Page 12 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-01-400-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 7. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT C406-2) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) ARTEX C406-2. (2) Before the installation of the ELT C406-2 it is necessary to program it. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER SYSTEM AMM TASK 25-61-00-400-802-A/200 (ARTEX C406-2) - PROGRAMMING EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER SYSTEM AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-803-A/500 (ELT C406-2) - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Center fuselage IV, Passenger cabin - 262 RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage 4 I. Installation SUBTASK 420-004-A (1) If you install an unit different from that you removed from the aircraft, do the programming of the ELT C406-2 system ( AMM TASK 25-61-00-400-802-A/200). NOTE: • The equipment to be installed must be configured with the same parameters as the removed ELT. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-803-A/400 25-61-01 Page 13 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • The unit is already factory-programmed to work with the ELT serial number. To use this protocol with a new unit no programming is required, but a new registration is necessary. For registration information, contact local authority. (2) Put the ELT unit on its baseplate with the arrow in the flight direction. (3) Connect the coaxial cables and the molex connector cable to the ELT unit. (4) Install the mounting rack cap to the transmitter unit. (5) Attach the 2 screws on the front of the mounting rack. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) Close the toilet maintenance panel. (2) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, close the ELT circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it. (3) Do the Emergency Locator Transmitter System (ELT C406-2) - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-803-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-803-A/400 25-61-01 Page 14 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-01-040-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 8. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER - DEACTIVATION A. General (1) This task refers to item 25-61-01 - Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) of the DDPM. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit - instrument panel H. ELT - Deactivation SUBTASK 040-002-A (1) On the Circuit Breakers Panel, open the ELT circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Put an ELT INOP sign on the ELT remote switch panel. (3) Make an entry in the aircraft technical logbook to show that you did the deactivation procedure for the ELT. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 040-801-A/400 25-61-01 Page 15 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-01-440-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 9. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER - REACTIVATION A. General (1) This task refers to item 25-61-01 - Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) of the DDPM. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit - instrument panel H. ELT - Reactivation SUBTASK 440-002-A (1) Do the troubleshooting and the applicable corrective maintenance procedure for the ELT. (2) On the Circuit Breakers Panel, close the ELT circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it. (3) Remove the ELT INOP sign from the ELT remote switch panel. (4) Make an entry in the aircraft technical logbook to show that you did the reactivation procedure for the ELT. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 440-801-A/400 25-61-01 Page 16 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
